Ward 3
------

Council Member
--------------

Melody Nowowiejski
------------------

![Council 3 small](https://www.brownwoodtexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6402)

**Oath of Office:
*(last taken on May 11, 2021)***

“I, Melody Nowowiejski, do solemnly swear, that I will faithfully execute the duties of the office of City Councilmember, Ward 3 of the City of Brownwood, of the State of Texas, and will to the best of my ability preserve, protect, and defend the Constitution and laws of the United States and of this State, so help me God.”

“I,
Melody Nowowiejski
, do solemnly swear that I have not directly or indirectly paid, offered, promised to pay, contributed, or promised to contribute any money or thing of value, or promised any public office or employment for the giving or withholding of a vote at the election at which I was elected or as a reward to secure my appointment or confirmation, whichever the case may be, so help me God.”
